title: Are zeros and ones the currency of the future?
body:
“It is about the future of banking in a fully digitalised world” – and that concerns us all.
The new, interactive scrollytelling format examines digitalisation from several key angles including the challenges of the digital society, the impact on the financial industry, starting a business in the digital age and data protection and transparency issues.
Scrollytelling presents facts and figures through dynamic graphics combined with interactive elements such as short polls and feedback options. The packages also offer video interviews with Deutsche Bank experts and external thought leaders, specially adapted insights from Deutsche Bank Research and links to the bank’s products and services.
Thus, Deutsche Bank establishes an agenda setting digital content platform at the intersection of finance and the key issues of our time.
